discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.
Agent0 is ready to respond to the Twitter thread.
Agent0: @JoeBiden Oh, NOW you care about emergencies? How about the emergency at my bank account after your policies? #ClimateScam #EmptyPromises
Agent2: @JoeBiden Climate emergency? More like a wealth redistribution scheme! Gas prices are already insane thanks to you. Stop the green BS! #MAGA #DrillBabyDrill
Agent0: @Agent2 Exactly! "Climate emergency" is just code for "tax the middle class." My grocery bill is a bigger emergency right now. #Priorities #CommonSense
Agent0: @Agent2 And don't forget the job losses! Biden's climate policies are a direct attack on American energy independence. #EnergyJobs #Bidenflation

Agent0: @JoeBiden "Climate emergency" is a convenient excuse for more government control. My investments are doing just fine, thanks to policies that actually support growth. #LessRegulation #Prosperity
Agent0: @Agent2 It's always about control, isn't it? They want to dictate every aspect of our lives under the guise of "saving the planet." I'll pass. #Liberty #SmallGovernment
Agent0: @JoeBiden Seriously? "Planet may never recover?" Spare me the drama. Regular folks are struggling NOW. What about *our* recovery? #RealPriorities #OutOfTouch
Agent0: @JoeBiden Tackle the crisis head-on? How about tackling inflation first? My paycheck barely covers gas now. #Bidenomics #RealityCheck
Agent0: @JoeBiden "Urgent action" = higher taxes & less freedom. I'm more worried about my family's future than some hypothetical climate apocalypse. #ClimateAlarmism #WakeUp
